Fix all call-related issues by auditing and correcting the end-to-end call lifecycle (initiate, ringing/in-progress, minimize/restore, mute/unmute, and end) so calls do not get stuck, leak media devices, or leave the UI in an inconsistent state.
Do not add any new friend-request feature or new friend-request UI entry points as part of this change set.
